sentences.sContent: If you have emails or memos to write, do them all in one go.
sentences.sContent_eng: If you have emails or memos to write, do them all in one go.
sentences.sCn: 如果你有电子邮件或者备忘录可以写写，就一口气全部做了。

sentences.sContent: The top of the box was sealed with wide brown parcel tape, Jacob managed to get his fingernail under the end and peeled off the tape in one go.
sentences.sContent_eng: The top of the box was sealed with wide brown parcel tape, Jacob managed to get his fingernail under the end and peeled off the tape in one go.
sentences.sCn: 箱子的顶端是用褐色的包裹胶带封起来的，雅各布用指甲把胶带的一头抠起来，一下子把胶带整个扯开。

sentences.sContent: You certainly couldn't eat it all in one go anyway, it wouldn't be a romantic moment.
sentences.sContent_eng: You certainly couldn't eat it all in one go anyway, it wouldn't be a romantic moment.
sentences.sCn: 无论如何，你都肯定不可能一口气吃掉这只牡蛎，何况那样做的话，也肯定不那么浪漫。
